messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] where do I find a certified teacher to evaluate work
messages.msgSnippet:
I don t understand how you are unschooling and have work that can be
evaluated. Lesa http://lifeacademy.homeschooljournal.net ... From: Tommy Date: 10/05/06
messages.messageBody:
I don't understand how you are unschooling and have work that can be
evaluated.

Lesa
http://lifeacademy.homeschooljournal.net
-------Original Message-------

From: Tommy
Date: 10/05/06 16:19:16
To: unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [unschoolingbasics] where do I find a certified teacher to evaluate
work

I was wondering where do I find a teacher to evaluate my children's work? I
am not sure. My mother who was a public school teacher for 25 years now
homeschools my adopted brother and sister but has them tested by my Aunt who
is also a teacher I was also adopted but went to private school but because
my siblings are drug effected they require a lot of assistance. I choose to
teach my children at home and I am now glad I did with all of the shootings
and such going on around us. but back on track I just wanted to know because
I either have to have them take the proficency test or have the work
evaluated by a certified teacher. My children are 7, 5, and 3 5 yo has
special needs ( had brain surgery last year)

Thank you
GracieAnn
Oh also what is expected of children to learn.

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]





[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.messageBody:
I was wondering where do I find a teacher to evaluate my children's work? I am not sure. My mother who was a public school teacher for 25 years now homeschools my adopted brother and sister but has them tested by my Aunt who is also a teacher I was also adopted but went to private school but because my siblings are drug effected they require a lot of assistance. I choose to teach my children at home and I am now glad I did with all of the shootings and such going on around us. but back on track I just wanted to know because I either have to have them take the proficency test or have the work evaluated by a certified teacher. My children are 7, 5, and 3 5 yo has special needs ( had brain surgery last year)

Thank you
GracieAnn
Oh also what is expected of children to learn.
